verses.kjv: The word of the LORD that came unto Hosea, the son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
verses.ct: This is the message from the LORD that came to Hosea son of Beeri during the reigns of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and during the reign of Jeroboam son of Joash, king of Israel.

verses.kjv: The beginning of the word of the LORD by Hosea. And the LORD said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the LORD.
verses.ct: When the LORD first spoke through Hosea, the LORD told him, "Go and marry a woman known for prostitution, and have children with her, because this nation has been deeply unfaithful to the LORD, prostituting itself with other gods."

verses.kjv: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim; which conceived, and bare him a son.
verses.ct: So Hosea married Gomer daughter of Diblaim, and she became pregnant and gave birth to a son for him.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto him, Call his name Jezreel; for yet a little while, and I will avenge the blood of Jezreel upon the house of Jehu, and will cause to cease the kingdom of the house of Israel.
verses.ct: The LORD told him, "Name him Jezreel, because in just a short time I will punish the dynasty of Jehu for the massacre at Jezreel, and I will bring the kingdom of Israel to an end."

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass at that day, that I will break the bow of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.
verses.ct: "On that day, I will shatter Israel's military power in the valley of Jezreel."

verses.kjv: And she conceived again, and bare a daughter. And God said unto him, Call her name Loruhamah: for I will no more have mercy upon the house of Israel; but I will utterly take them away.
verses.ct: Gomer became pregnant again and gave birth to a daughter. God told Hosea, "Name her Lo-ruhamah, because I will no longer show mercy to the nation of Israel. I will completely remove them."

verses.kjv: But I will have mercy upon the house of Judah, and will save them by the LORD their God, and will not save them by bow, nor by sword, nor by battle, by horses, nor by horsemen.
verses.ct: "But I will show mercy to the nation of Judah and rescue them through the LORD their God. I will not rescue them through weapons, swords, warfare, horses, or cavalry."

verses.kjv: Now when she had weaned Loruhamah, she conceived, and bare a son.
verses.ct: After Gomer had weaned Lo-ruhamah, she became pregnant and gave birth to another son.

verses.kjv: Then said God, Call his name Loammi: for ye are not my people, and I will not be your God.
verses.ct: God said, "Name him Lo-ammi, because you are not my people, and I am not your God."

verses.kjv: Yet the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured nor numbered; and it shall come to pass, that in the place where it was said unto them, Ye are not my people, there it shall be said unto them, Ye are the sons of the living God.
verses.ct: "Yet the time will come when the people of Israel will be as countless as sand on the seashore, impossible to measure or count. In the very place where they were told, 'You are not my people,' they will be called 'children of the living God.'"

verses.kjv: Then shall the children of Judah and the children of Israel be gathered together, and appoint themselves one head, and they shall come up out of the land: for great shall be the day of Jezreel.
verses.ct: "The people of Judah and the people of Israel will be reunited together. They will choose one leader for themselves and will rise up from the land, because the day of Jezreel will be magnificent."
